title: Spicy Tuna Roll with Sriracha Aioli

Ingredients.3: 2 ounces sushi grade tuna, finely diced

Directions.1: Mix Japanese mayo and Sriracha together in a bowl. Mix in tuna, scallion, and tobiko.

Directions.2: Put the rice on top of the seaweed and spread it down. Flip over so rice side is down. Place tuna mixture in center of the seaweed. Using your fingertips, roll it up. Use a bamboo mat to push roll into a shape and push ingredients in on each side. Use a sharp knife dipped in water to cut into 6 pieces.
